thread.title: London Film Festival focuses on women; protests at premiere
thread.title_full: London Film Festival focuses on women; protests at premiere

title: London Film Festival focuses on women; protests at premiere
text:
> Entertainment London Film Festival focuses on women; protests at premiere From left, Romola Garai, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne-Marie Duff and Carey Mulligan pose for photographers upon arrival at the premiere of the film Suffragette, which is also the opening gala of the London film festival in London, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. The festival runs from Oct. 7 until Oct. 18. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
